name: Power surge (Tito91)
description:
Unfortunately, we noticed a few minutes after the jam's end that we didn't upload the good build... The version we submitted has a critical bug. 

Here's the good one for those who want to test the game : https://rhum.itch.io/power-surge

A bullet hell game in which the player's balls bounce indefinitely against the walls, adding difficulty as you go along. 

You can shot, dodge and that's all ! Kill all the ennemies and try to not get out of control !

Instruction :

On keyboard 

  • ZQSD/ or WASD to move 
  • Mouse to aim 
  • Mouse left clic to shoot
  • Space to dodge

on controller

  • B to dodge
  • RB to Shoot
  • left stick to move 
  • Right stick to aim 

TEAM

  • Developer               Pillonel Matthis / Rioust Lucas / Barbé Paul/ Guitton Thomas
  • Visuals                       Kalva João
  • Sound Design        Afonso Alexandre / Guitton Thomas
  • Game Design         Afonso Alexandre/ Rioust Lucas
